original: Source: ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K, 8/15/2019 3. Term . This Agreement will be in effect for three (3) years from the Effective Date (“ Initial Term ”) unless terminated earlier in accordance with this Agreement. This Agreement shall automatically extend for an additional two (2) years on the same terms herein (“ Renewal Term ”) provided WPT receives payments greater than twelve million U.S. dollars ($12,000,000) within the Initial Term. The Initial Term and any such Renewal Term are collectively referred to as the “ Term .” 4. Annual Minimum Guarantee . Zynga will pay WPT three million U.S. dollars ($3,000,000) per year according to the following schedule (which the parties may alter upon mutual agreement) (the “ Annual Minimum Guarantee ”):
ollama_generated:
Clause:

Source: ALLIED ESPORTS ENTERTAINMENT, INC., 8-K, 8/15/2019

3. Term: This Agreement will remain binding for a period of three (3) years from the Effective Date (" Initial Term "), but either party may terminate it earlier in accordance with the terms herein. Should this Agreement continue beyond the Initial Term, it will automatically renew for an additional two (2) years on the same terms (" Renewal Term ") if and only if WPT receives payments exceeding twelve million U.S. dollars ($12,000,000) within the Initial Term. The Initial Term, the Renewal Term, and any additional periods resulting from this clause shall collectively be referred to as the " Term ."

4. Annual Minimum Guarantee: WPT will receive three million U.S. dollars ($3,000,000) per year according to the following schedule (which may be amended by mutual agreement) (the " Annual Minimum Guarantee ") from Zynga, subject to the condition that payments are made only if the annual sum falls below this amount during the term of this Agreement.

original: e. “Annual Minimum Guarantee ” means the guaranteed minimum amount due to WPT by Zynga in consideration of the rights granted herein, which amount may be recoupable from Royalties as set forth below and in the Basic Provisions.
ollama_generated: f. "Minimum Annual Payment" refers to the minimum payment that Zynga owes to WPT for the granted rights, with the possibility of this payment being offset by Royalties as detailed below and in the Fundamental Provisions. This liability is subject to potential recoupment from the aforementioned Royalty payments.

original: f. “Royalty ” means the amount(s) set forth in the Basic Provisions and calculated as described in the Additional Provisions.
ollama_generated: g. "Royalties" refer to the amounts detailed within the Basic Provisions, which may be subject to alteration based on the guidelines provided in the Additional Provisions. The obligation to pay these royalties shall not be considered a fixed commitment and may be adjusted or revised at our discretion.

original: b. License by Zynga . Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Zynga grants to WPT a non-exclusive, non- assignable, non-sublicensable, royalty-free, paid up, limited worldwide license to use and display Zynga’s Licensed Property solely as necessary to perform WPT’s obligations under this Agreement and as specifically described on Exhibit A, in any and all media now known or hereafter devised, for the Term (subject to Section 7.e. of Additional Provisions).
ollama_generated: a. Grant of License by WPT: Granted that the conditions set forth within this Agreement are met, WPT hereby grants to Zynga a non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicensable, royalty-free, and revocable license, without compensation, to use and exhibit WPT's Licensed Property for any purpose as Zynga deems necessary or convenient, in any and all media currently known or hereafter developed, throughout the Term (with due consideration to Section 7.e. of Additional Provisions), subject only to the limitations specified in Exhibit A.

original: i.Licensee may use textual and/or pictorial matter pertaining to the Licensed Property on such promotional, display and advertising material as may, in Licensee’s reasonable judgment, promote the awareness, consumption and sale of the Licensed Property. All final advertising and promotional material using the Licensed Property must be submitted to Licensor for its prior written approval. All press releases respecting this Agreement or the relationship of the parties herein shall require prior written approval by the other party.
ollama_generated: i. Licensee is granted the right, at their discretion, to employ textual and/or graphic elements related to the Licensed Property for promotional, exhibitory, and advertising purposes. Such materials should, in the opinion of Licensee, augment the visibility, demand, and distribution of the Licensed Property. All preliminary advertising and promotional content utilizing the Licensed Property is required to secure Licensor's written approval prior to dissemination. Any press releases concerning this Agreement or the interactions between the parties herein necessitate prior written consent from both parties before release.

original: iii.Zynga shall advise WPT to Zynga’s knowledge as to which jurisdictions where it may be illegal to advertise Zynga’s Licensed Property (if any) given local laws or regulations.
modified: iii. It is the responsibility of WPT to identify and inform Zynga of jurisdictions where advertising Zynga's Licensed Property may be prohibited by local laws or regulations, to the extent that such information is within WPT's knowledge.

original: b. Royalty . The Royalties to be paid by Zynga to WPT is the percentage of Net Revenue as set forth in Section 5 of the Basic Provisions. “ Net Revenue(s) ” shall be defined as one hundred percent (100%) of gross revenues and all other receivables of any kind whatsoever received by Zynga or any of Zynga’s affiliates attributable to the use of Paid Currency or in connection with the sale of Virtual Digital Goods derived from use of the WPT-brand on the Zynga platform, less the following actual and verifiable “Allowable Deductions ”: (i) out-of-pocket, third-party payment processing and currency system fees, commissions, and platform distribution fees (e.g., Apple, Google or Facebook platform fees); (ii) any governmental taxes (e.g., VAT, excise or sales or use tax, etc.) arising in connection with related receipts, but excluding any taxes on Licensee’s net income; and (iii) charge- backs/refunds/cancellations/fraud. “ Paid Currency ” means virtual currency purchased using real money. “ Virtual Digital Goods ” means any virtual, digital representation of any actual or fictional thing or item within Zynga Poker, which is capable of being made available for distribution, placement, download or other display by electronic means. Any other deductions must be mutually agreed upon in advance and in writing by the parties.
ollama_generated: c. Royalties Owed: WPT shall receive from Zynga a royalty, specified in Section 5 of the Basic Provisions, constituting a percentage of Gross Revenue. "Gross Revenue(s)" shall be deemed as the sum total of all revenues and receivables received by Zynga or any of its affiliates, which are traceable to the utilization of Real Currency or transactions involving the acquisition of Virtual Digital Goods linked to the WPT brand on the Zynga platform. The aforementioned gross revenues shall be subject to the following deductions, which are not limited to: (i) fees for third-party payment processing, currency systems, commissions, and distribution fees (such as those levied by Apple, Google, or Facebook); (ii) taxes on revenues associated with these receipts, including VAT, excise, sales, or use tax, excepting taxes on the Licensee's net income; and (iii) charge-backs, refunds, cancellations, or fraud. "Real Currency" denotes actual money used for purchasing virtual currency. "Virtual Digital Goods" refers to any virtual, digital representation of an actual or fictional item within Zynga Poker, which can be electronically distributed, placed, downloaded, or displayed. Any deductions not explicitly agreed upon in writing and in advance by the parties will be considered invalid.

original: b. Zynga shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless WPT and its Affiliates, and the respective directors, officers and employees of the foregoing (the “WPT Indemnified Parties”) from and against any and all third party claims, actions, suits, costs, liabilities, judgments, obligations, losses, penalties, expenses or damages (including, without limitation, reasonable legal fees and expenses) of whatsoever kind and nature imposed on, incurred by or asserted against any of the WPT Indemnified Parties arising out: (i) any breach or alleged breach by Zynga of any representation, warranty or covenant made by Zynga pursuant to this Agreement; or (ii) Zynga’s non-compliance with any applicable federal, state or local laws or with any applicable regulations in connection with its performance of this Agreement.
ollama_generated:
a. WPT and its Affiliates, as well as the respective directors, officers, and employees of the aforementioned parties (the "Zynga Indemnified Parties"), shall be entitled to indemnification, defense, and protection from harm by Zynga, against any third-party claims, actions, suits, costs, liabilities, judgments, obligations, losses, penalties, expenses, or damages (including reasonable legal fees and expenses) that may arise due to:
   (i) any breach or alleged breach of a representation, warranty, or covenant made by WPT in this Agreement; or
   (ii) non-compliance with any applicable federal, state, or local laws or regulations on the part of WPT during its fulfillment of this Agreement. The responsibility for such indemnification and protection shifts from Zynga to WPT under these circumstances.

original: a.In the event that any of these events of default should occur and a party elects to exercise its right to terminate this Agreement, such party shall give notice of termination in writing to the other party, which notice shall specify in reasonable detail the event(s) of default that give rise to such termination. The other party shall have thirty (30) days from the effective date of such notice in which to correct any such default(s) (except those which are not curable), and failing such correction by the end of such thirty (30) day cure period, this Agreement shall thereupon immediately terminate.
ollama_generated: a.In the event that any of the specified breaches or defaults occur under this Agreement and a party decides to invoke its right to dissolve this contract, written notice of such termination must be provided to the other party, outlining in sufficient detail the specific instances of breach or default justifying the termination. The receiving party will have thirty (30) days, starting from the effective date of the notice, to remedy any such breaches or defaults (except for those classified as irreparable). Should the non-breaching party fail to rectify the issues within this thirty-day grace period, the termination shall take effect immediately. However, the responsibility to assess whether a cure is feasible in the given circumstances lies solely with the breaching party.

original: b. All rights granted to Zynga by WPT shall immediately revert to WPT, and Zynga shall promptly cease any and all marketing and promotional activities using WPT’s Licensed Property.
ollama_generated: a. WPT grants Zynga the right to use its Licensed Property for marketing and promotional purposes only up until termination of this agreement, after which Zynga shall have 30 days to fully cease all activities involving the use of WPT's Licensed Property. Any rights not expressly granted to Zynga by this agreement shall remain with WPT.

original: g. Governing Law and Forum . This Agreement will for all purposes be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of California without giving effect to any conflict of laws principles that require the application of the laws of a different state. Each of the parties hereto (i) irrevocably agrees that the federal and state courts in the Northern District of California shall have sole and exclusive jurisdiction over any suit or other proceeding arising out of or based upon this Agreement, (ii) submits to the venue and jurisdiction of such courts, and (iii) irrevocably consents to personal jurisdiction by such courts.
ollama_generated: h. Jurisdiction and Applicable Law . This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, excluding its conflict-of-law principles that might refer to the substantive laws of another jurisdiction. Each of the parties hereto (i) irrevocably waives any objection based on venue or inconvenience, acknowledges service of process within the State of California to be effective, and consents to the personal jurisdiction and general jurisdiction of the federal and state courts in the Northern District of California for any lawsuit, action, or proceeding arising out of or related to this Agreement, (ii) waives any right to trial by jury in connection with any such claim, (iii) agrees that any such court shall have the authority to grant injunctions or order specific performance of obligations under this Agreement, and (iv) irrevocably submits to the jurisdiction and forum specified herein.
